thread.title: Howard, Sharon & Mom
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Howard, Sharon & Mom

author: Howard, Sharon & Mom
title: Howard, Sharon & Mom
text: I had a wonderful experience with Kimberly Leed last year, so that not only did I return to do my husband's and my taxes this year, but I brought my elderly mom as well. My mom also appreciated the care, attention, and efficient tax preparation she received. From our experiences we learned that tax time can be painless, and now it is :)
